text.headline: Alexandros Chionidis — Life & Career
text.text: Explore key milestones across education and work experience.

text.headline: 🎓 BSc Informatics & Telecommunications
text.text: Completed coursework and thesis at the University of Athens, focusing on software engineering and data systems.

text.headline: 🛍️ Store Manager — Retail (Ekali)
text.text: Led operations, customer service, and sales strategy for a local retail business in Ekali, Athens.

text.headline: 🛠️ Data Engineer — Netcompany-Intrasoft
text.text: Designed and implemented big data pipelines using Spark and Scala for large-scale analytics on-premise.

text.headline: 🚀 Data Engineer — Waymore
text.text: Built and led a real-time data platform using Spark, Kafka, and GCP; improved processing speed and system scalability.
